post.description:
Create new consultation record

RFP Reference: POST /consultations
- Saves to RDB
- Indexes in VectorStore
- Returns created consultation

FR-1: 상담 등록 (RDB 저장 + VectorStore 인덱싱/재시도 큐 연동)
TODO: current_user = Depends(get_current_user) 추가 후 created_by_user_id 매핑

get.description:
Search for similar consultations using vector similarity

RFP Reference: GET /consultations/search
- Vector-based semantic search
- Metadata filtering (branch, business_type, error_code)
- Threshold-based result filtering

schema.title: Response Search Consultations Post Api V1 Consultations Search Post

post.description:
Generate manual draft from consultation using LLM

RFP Reference: POST /consultations/{id}/manual-draft
- LLM extracts keywords
- LLM generates manual structure
- Returns draft for user review

TODO: Implement actual logic

schema.title: Response Generate Manual Draft Api V1 Consultations  Consultation Id  Manual Draft Post

post.description: FR-2/FR-9: 상담 기반 메뉴얼 초안 생성 (환각 검증 포함).

post.summary: Check conflict and create review task

post.summary: Approve manual and bump version set

get.description: FR-14: 버전 목록 조회 (단일 그룹 가정).

get.summary: Diff draft set with active version

schema.title: Response List Manuals Api V1 Manuals Get

get.description:
Search manuals using vector similarity

RFP Reference: GET /manuals/search
- Vector-based semantic search
- Filter by status, business_type, error_code

schema.title: Response Search Manuals Api V1 Manuals Search Get

post.description:
Create review task for manual entry

RFP Reference: POST /manuals/{id}/review
- Detects conflicts with existing manuals
- Creates ManualReviewTask if needed

schema.title: Response Create Manual Review Api V1 Manuals  Manual Id  Review Post

get.description:
List manual review tasks with optional status filter

RFP Reference: GET /tasks/manual-review
- Returns pending/in-progress/done/rejected tasks
- For reviewers to see what needs attention

TODO: Implement filtering and pagination

schema.title: Response List Review Tasks Api V1 Manual Review Tasks Get

post.description:
Approve manual review task

RFP Reference: POST /tasks/manual-review/{id}/approve
- Updates task status to DONE
- Approves new manual entry
- Deprecates old manual (if exists)
- Creates new ManualVersion (if requested)

TODO: Implement approval workflow

Reject manual review task

RFP Reference: POST /tasks/manual-review/{id}/reject
- Updates task status to REJECTED
- Saves rejection reason
- Notifies submitter (optional)

TODO: Implement rejection workflow

get.description: 토큰으로 인증된 현재 사용자 정보를 반환.
